summary: For those who can't run ENBs and enjoy getting drunk, just like me.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][b][size=4]This preset was based on a fantasy world with cold colors and warm lights.
Check my previous [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70929/?]preset[/url] in case on you don't like this one.
Pics and Videos are welcome here :)

[b][size=6][b][size=4][b][size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]0 ~ 4 FPS LOSS ON SOME AREAS[/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b]

REQUIREMENTS[/size]
[size=2]IT'S RECOMMENDED THAT YOU USE THOSE MODS ALONG FOR THE DRUNKEST EFFECT

[/size][size=4]
[/size][list]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855/?][size=4]Shadows (for weather lightning tweak)[/size][/url][/b]
[/list][size=4]
[/size][list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?][size=4]IMAGINATOR (contrast and brightness tweaking)[/size][/url]
[/list][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]
[/size][/font][list]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/][size=4]Dynavision (for DOF)[/size][/url][/b]
[size=3]
[/size][/list][/b][b][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/b][b]
[list]
[*][b][size=4]Turn your antialiasing OFF (this preset uses a SMAA, which is lighter)[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Install the required mods if you want[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Copy the files to where the TESV.exe is[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Go to the Imagintor MCMenu and set it like this:[/size][/b]
[/list][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/2tIXU2F.png[/img]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6][b]COMPATIBILITY[/b][/size][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38649/?]ENBOOST[/url]Â (Same for Any ENB)[/b]
[list]
[*]Install ENBoost according to the directions on its description.
[*]Extract the files from this mods archive to a folder on your desktop.
[*]Rename the d3d9.dll file from this to something like d3d9_sweetfx.dll.
[*]Open your enblocal.ini file from ENBoost with Notepad or Notepad++ replace the [PROXY] section with this:
[/list]
[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=true
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary=d3d9_sweetfx.dll (or whatever you renamed the SweetFX .dll to)

[list]
[*]Copy the contents of the extracted folder on your desktop with the renamed .dll to your Skyrim folder as you would installing the mod normally.
[/list]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15123/?][b]HIALGOBOOST[/b][/url]
Hialgoboost newest version does not need a proxy anymore :)


[b]Hope you guys don't throw rocks at me for this :)[/b]
[size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/font]
author: Kovak22
